key.name: twenty-four-hour
key.summary: If GoodTime should use 24-hour time as opposed to 12-hour.

key.name: alarm-mode
key.description: The alarm mode that will choose which alarm tone will be played, and how.

key.name: alarm-net-uri
key.summary: The network URI for an alarm tone.
key.description: The network URI that shall be used by GoodTime if it is set to use the network for its alarm tone. (This URI must be usable with GStreamer.)

key.name: alarm-fs-uri
key.summary: The filesystem URI for an alarm tone.
key.description: The filesystem URI to be used as the alarm tone if GoodTime is in Filesystem mode.
